definitions.title: vb. slaughter, beat
definitions.body: (orig. beat, flay? cf. As. šaḫâṭu, flay, take off dress; Ar. sah.at.a slay (but h. = ḫ; is this loan-word in Ar. ?); NH = BH, esp. in ritual);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[שׁ]]: Je 39:6 +, sf. [[וּשְׁחָטוֹ]] consec. Le 3:2, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשְׁחַט]] Le 4:24 +, 2 fs. [[וַתִּשְׁחֲטִי]] Ez Eze 16:21, 3 mpl. sf. [[וַיִּשְׁחָט֫וּהוּ]] Ju Jdg 12:6; Imv. mpl. [[שַׁחֲטוּ]] Ex 12:21, 2Ch 35:6; Inf. abs. [[שָׁחׂט]] Is 22:13; cstr. [[לִשְׁחׂט]] Ge 22:10, [[וֹט]]- Ez Eze 40:39, sf. [[שַׁחֲטָם]] (Ges:§ 64 a) Ez Eze 23:39; Pt. act. [[שׁוֹחֵט]] Is 66:3, etc.; pass. [[שָׁחוּט]] 1Ki 10:16 +, etc.;—slaughter:

usu. (51 t.; Hex only P, 38 t.) term. techn. of killing sacrifice (BJacob:ZAW xvii (1897), 5i), 1Sa 1:25, Ex 29:11, Le 1:5, Le 1:11, Le 4:24, Le 9:8, Nu 19:3, 2Ch 29:22, 2Ch 29:22, 2Ch 29:24 +; abs. Ez Eze 40:41 ([[אֶל]] loc.); bird Le 14:5, Le 14:6, Le 14:50, Le 14:51; beast in illicit sacrifice Is 66:3; c. acc. of sacrifice ([[עוֹלָה]], [[אָשָׁם]], [[חַטָאת]], etc.) Ez Eze 40:39 ([[אֶל]] loc.), v:Eze 40:42, Eze 44:11, Le 4:24, Le 7:2, Le 14:13 +; passover lamb † Ex 12:6, acc. [[הַפֶּסַח]] † v:Ex 12:21, 2Ch 30:15, 2Ch 35:1, 2Ch 35:6, 2Ch 35:11, Ezr 6:20.

slaughter pers. Ju Jdg 12:6, 1Ki 18:40, 2Ki 10:7, 2Ki 10:14 ([[אֶל]] loc.), 2Ki 25:7 = Je 39:6 a = Je 52:10 a, Je 39:6 b = Je 52:10 b, Je 41:7; ´[[י]]: subj. Nu 14:16 (JE); in human sacrifice Ge 22:10 (E), to false gods Ez Eze 16:21, Eze 23:39, Is 57:5.
pt. pass. = beaten, hammered, [[זׇהָב שָׁחוּט]] 1Ki 10:16, 1Ki 10:17 = 2Ch 9:15 a, 2Ch 9:16, of shekels 2Ch 9:15; so also Je 9:7 Qr [[חֵץ שָׁחוּט]] (> Kt [[שׁוֹחֵט]]) hammered (i.e. sharpened) arrow. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשָּׁחֵט]] Nu 11:22 (J) be slaughtered for food (subj. beast); 3 fs. [[תִּשָּׁחֵט]] Le 6:18, Le 6:18 (P) be slain, of sacrifice.
